short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A positive message to cheer you up

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a dropdown menu that reads "You are Amazing!" It will give you a positive affirmation to continue throughout your day while bolstering your emotional wellbeing.
